channel.title: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!
channel.description:
[b]This template is 100% coded by myself, if you want proof I'll re code this right infront of your eyes![/b]
Let's get to this, shall we!
The home page consists of 6 links: Home, Forums, Webclient (at the top) and xat chat, facebook page, youtube channel (at the bottom)
The webclient page consists of the same 6 links but has the webclient above chat box:
Home page: [url=http://prntscr.com/kov46]http://prntscr.com/kov46[/url]
Webclient page (top): [url=http://prntscr.com/kova3]http://prntscr.com/kova3[/url] (bottom) [url=http://prntscr.com/kovg7]http://prntscr.com/kovg7[/url]
I understand that the server's information is in these pictures but I am [b]NOT[/b] advertising! Tell me what you think and if you want any color changes so you guys can use let me know and if you need any other assistance just PM me via forums!
-Sibor
P.S: Sorry for links and not images; the [img][/img] tage won't work for me :/

item.title: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Sibor:

Really Ruby? Your dumb. If no one read someone elses tutorial, we would NEVER learn… think before you post. Also my code is fine.

No. If people never read anyone elses tutorials then there wouldn’t be an accumulation of errorous code. It’d be by the documentation. If you’re using tables for styling then no, your code is not fine.

Read full topic

item.title: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:16, topic:470085”]I’ve always wanted to learn a web programming language. It seems really fun.[/quote][quote=“Sibor, post:17, topic:470085”]Web Designing is fun, it allows you to be creative and give your website a unique design!

I have the tutorial finished for you so PM me and I’ll send it your way!![/quote]
No offence to Sibor or anything, but by looking at the previous code he’s in no way fit to be teaching website design. If you wish to learn website design in a professionalistic manner you should take a good look at the documentation found on this site.

In my opinion people should never refer to tutorials written by other people, I know it’s bad that I’ve actually written 15 tutorials or whatever but I honestly think that people should refer to the actual documentation. However a lot of those tutorials were requested so I wrote them anyway.

Read full topic

I also felt the work from the owner background a little off. I just saw how excited you were when you showed me this so I kept my mouth shut.

6/10, as the design totally matched froyoscape, simplicity.

item.source: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!

item.title: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

No, this was not made by two people! I worked on this for probably an hour and a half. Also this template design game from rspscoding,org. Yes there is PHP, it logs IP address and don’t worry I clear the ip.txt every hour. On a sidenote thanks for posting back and telling me how I could do this better.

-Sibor

P.S: The div tag should work fine to replace the tables, correct?

Read full topic
item.source: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!

item.title: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

First thing I can pick up on is your use of tables, tables are no longer valid as a styling element and should be styled using CSS, you should change that :P. It looks as though two people have actually worked on it, half of it is styled with tables and the other half is styled with CSS, a little suspicious ;). I don’t really think the blue fits nicely, just do some trial and error with other colours and see if something fits better :).

If there’s any PHP you’d like looked at feel free to post it. I’m expecting there is PHP in it since: [code=html]

[/code]

Wait, isn’t that a premade hosting 24 template? :eek:

Read full topic

item.source: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!

item.title: New website template! 100% my code! Please Comment!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I can’t say I’m a big fan of the two-toned colour system you have on the top and bottom, it just doesn’t do it for me. It’s a nice try to the design aspect of a site and I would be more than happy to take a look at the source-code for you but the design of the template just doesn’t cut it for me.

Maybe a 6/10, I like basic templates, but this is just… something missing. Good try though! It beats your last one :P.

Read full topic
